name: Pick n' Clash
description:
Instructions

Challenge a friend to mine some gold!

Mining: Hold action key to collect gold. The longer you hold it, the more you earn.

Counter: Hit action key to counter. If you time it correctly, you will damage the pickaxe of your opponent.

Victory: As soon as a player pickaxe durability reach 0, the game end. The winner is the one with more gold.

Pickaxe Penalty: If your pickaxe durability reach 0, you loose 30% of your gold.

Commands

Player 1 action key: X 

Player 2 action key: Up Arrow 

New game (ones the game ends): Enter or spacebar
